purpose: The email announces a full-time Post-Doc position at the Johannes Kepler University Linz Institute of Technology, focusing on software engineering research in collaboration with Dynatrace. The position is for a duration of up to three years and involves conducting research in areas such as distributed software systems, cloud computing, and real-time data processing. The successful candidate will be expected to apply for research grants, publish findings, and collaborate with other researchers and students. Qualifications include a Ph.D. in Computer Science or a related field, experience in relevant research areas, and proficiency in English. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by August 10.

evidence_sentences: We are looking for a (up to three-years contract) Post-Doc for the Johannes Kepler University (JKU) Linz Institute of Technology (LIT).
The Post-Doc is expected to conduct software engineering research in the JKU / Dynatrace Austria Co-Innovation Lab, with a particular focus on one or several of the following topics:
(o) Conduct Software Engineering research in the fields mentioned above
(o) Lay the foundation for the next generation of highly scalable, data-driven software applications in collaboration with one of the industry leaders in software intelligence, i.e., Dynatrace
(o) Publish, present and disseminate research findings in journals, conferences and workshops
(o) Collaborate with fellow JKU researchers and academic and industrial partners in Austria and abroad
The successful candidate must hold a Doctorate/Ph.D. degree in Computer Science or a related field
Apply now via the link below (Deadline Aug 10) or contact me in case you have any questions.
